channel.title: Alphabit Fund Website
channel.description: Recent content on Alphabit Fund Website

item.title: Invest
item.description: INVEST The Alphabit fund is an open-ended cryptocurrency fund for accredited investors. The fund has the objective to outperform a buy-and-hold strategy for Bitcoin. Our strategy deploys a combination of Manual trading (Long and Short), Algorithmic trading, and early investment into blockchain based start-ups for tokens and equity. If you feel you meet the requirements to invest in the fund we would love to hear from you. Please fill in the form below and we will get back to you.

item.title: Our Team
item.description: TEAM MEMBERS Liam Robertson Chief Executive OfficerCFA, CAIA Chris Kitze Chairman Andrew Ivison Chief Operating Officer Anandaprabu Rajendran Head of Trading Brad Mills Advisor Michael Terpin Advisor LIAM ROBERTSON Chief Executive Officer Chartered Financial Analyst (CFA) and Chartered Alternative Investment Analyst (CAIA), Liam holds a degree in Economics from the University of Newcastle-Upon-Tyne.

item.title: Risk Warning
item.description: Risk Warning Important information Past performance is not a guide to future performance, nor a reliable indicator of future results or performance. The value of investments, and the income or capital entitlement which may derive from them, if any, may go down as well as up and is not guaranteed; therefore, investors may not get back the amount originally invested. Unless the performance of an investment meets or exceeds the rate of inflation, the real value of that investment will reduce.

item.title: Disclaimer
item.description: Disclaimer Website Disclaimer: This website www.alphabit.fund (the “Website”), is a website of Alphabit Limited(“AB”). These terms and conditions (the “Terms”) govern your access to and use of this Website. Please read these Terms carefully. By continuing to access and use the Website you are deemed to have understood and agreed to the Terms. 1. WEBSITE CONTENT This Website contains text, data, graphics, photographs, illustrations, artwork, names, logos, trademarks, service marks and information connected with Alphabit Limited and its group undertakings or third-party licensors (“Information”).
